author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Bentley's Whiskey Bar Presents Glenmorangie Scotch Tasting at four seasons hotel bakuTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Bentley’s Whiskey Bar Presents Glenmorangie Scotch Tasting at four seasons hotel baku Published on : Tuesday, October 6, 2015
Bentley’s Whiskey Bar at Four Seasons Hotel Baku invites guests to spend a lovely evening and enjoy a magnificent Glenmorangie scotch tasting on October 30, 2015 from 8:00 to 10:00 pm.
Bentley’s will provide guests with an opportunity to enjoy a wide variety of whisky and small canapés. A La Latino Jazz Band will accompany this amazing evening from 9:30 pm until 12:00 midnight to create a special and cosy atmosphere.
Whiskey that will be offered on October 30:
Glenmorangie The Original
Glenmorangie Lasanta (Extra Matured Range 12 year old)
Glenmorangie Quinta Ruban (Extra Matured Range 12 year old)
Glenmorangie Nectar D’Or (Extra Matured Range 12 year old)
Source:-Four Seasons
